title: Dashboard na Mara Lafiya
welcomeDoctor: Kula da marasa lafiya cikin basira.
noPatients: Ba a sami mara lafiya ba.
name: Suna
underweight: Nauyi ya yi ƙasa — ƙara cin abinci mai gina jiki da shan ruwa.
healthy: Nauyi lafiya — ci abinci mai kyau kuma ka motsa jiki.
overweight: Nauyi ya yi yawa — bi tsarin abinci na lafiya.
appSubtitle: Mai taimakon AI don farfadowa bayan tiyata
appDescription: Kula da farfadowarka, haɗa da likitanka, kuma sami shawarwari na AI.
smartCare: Kula mai hankali, taɓawar ɗan adam.
